title: 【やさしい日本語】熊本城(くまもとじょう)を ウクライナ(Ukraine)の 旗(はた)の 色(いろ)にした
cleaned_sentences: [Easy Japanese] Kumamoto Castle has been colored as the colour of the Ukraine flag.
Kumamoto Castle, which is lit in yellow and blue, On February 21, Russia began attacking Ukraine.
In Ukraine, the city has been broken and some have died.
Countries around the world, such as Japan, are opposed to attacks.
Kumamoto City opposes the war by using the town's Kumamoto Castle as the colour of the Ukrainian national flag.
Starting from March 1st, blue and yellow lights have been shining on the castle at night.
Near the castle, people at the shrine prayed for peace.
The mayor of Kumamoto City sent a letter to the Russian Embassy in Japan asking for Russian troops to leave Ukraine soon.
The original article is here Easy Japanese We deliver news translated into "easy Japanese" that is easy for foreigners and children to understand.
